s0440.literal: Seventh year, met with Wei Hui Wang at Du Ping.
s0440.idiomatic: Seventh year, met with Wei Hui Wang at Du Ping.

s0441.literal: Eighth year, fought with Wei at Yuanli, had merit.
s0441.idiomatic: Eighth year, fought with Wei at Yuanli, had merit.

s0442.chinese: 十年，衛鞅為大良造，將兵圍魏安邑，降之。
s0442.literal: Tenth year, Wei Yang became Grand Commandant, led troops to besiege Wei's Anyi, captured it.
s0442.idiomatic: Tenth year, Wei Yang became Grand Commandant, led troops to besiege Wei's Anyi, captured it.

s0443.chinese: 十二年，作為咸陽，筑冀闕，秦徙都之。
s0443.literal: Twelfth year, built Xianyang, constructed Ji Que, Qin moved capital there.
s0443.idiomatic: Twelfth year, built Xianyang, constructed Ji Que, Qin moved capital there.

s0444.chinese: 并諸小鄉聚，集為大縣，縣一令，四十一縣。
s0444.literal: Merged various small townships and settlements, assembled into large counties, each county one magistrate, forty-one counties.
s0444.idiomatic: Merged various small townships and settlements, assembled into large counties, each county one magistrate, forty-one counties.

s0445.literal: For fields opened the qian mo.
s0445.idiomatic: For fields opened the qian mo.

s0447.literal: Fourteenth year, first established land tax.
s0447.idiomatic: Fourteenth year, first established land tax.

s0448.literal: Nineteenth year, Son of Heaven granted hegemony.
s0448.idiomatic: Nineteenth year, Son of Heaven granted hegemony.

s0450.chinese: 秦使公子少官率師會諸侯逢澤，朝天子。
s0450.literal: Qin sent Prince Shao Guan to lead troops to meet the lords at Feng Ze, attend the Son of Heaven.
s0450.idiomatic: Qin sent Prince Shao Guan to lead troops to meet the lords at Feng Ze, attend the Son of Heaven.

s0451.literal: Twenty-first year, Qi defeated Wei at Ma Ling.
s0451.idiomatic: Twenty-first year, Qi defeated Wei at Ma Ling.

s0452.chinese: 二十二年，衛鞅擊魏，虜魏公子卬。
s0452.literal: Twenty-second year, Wei Yang attacked Wei, captured Wei prince Ang.
s0452.idiomatic: Twenty-second year, Wei Yang attacked Wei, captured Wei prince Ang.

s0453.literal: Enfeoffed Yang as Lie Hou, titled Lord Shang.
s0453.idiomatic: Enfeoffed Yang as Lie Hou, titled Lord Shang.

s0454.chinese: 二十四年，與晉戰雁門，虜其將魏錯。
s0454.literal: Twenty-fourth year, fought with Jin at Yanmen, captured their general Wei Cuo.
s0454.idiomatic: Twenty-fourth year, fought with Jin at Yanmen, captured their general Wei Cuo.

s0455.literal: Duke Xiao died, son Duke Huiwen ascended.
s0455.idiomatic: Duke Xiao died, son Duke Huiwen ascended.

s0457.chinese: 鞅之初為秦施法，法不行，太子犯禁。
s0457.literal: When Yang first implemented laws for Qin, laws did not work, crown prince violated prohibitions.
s0457.idiomatic: When Yang first implemented laws for Qin, laws did not work, crown prince violated prohibitions.

s0458.chinese: 鞅曰：「法之不行，自於貴戚。
s0458.literal: Yang said: 'The laws not working comes from the nobles and relatives.
s0458.idiomatic: Yang said: 'The laws not working comes from the nobles and relatives.

s0459.literal: If you lord must implement laws, start with the crown prince.
s0459.idiomatic: If you lord must implement laws, start with the crown prince.
